summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5764 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from Thurman Street to Gilman Avenue and from Gilman Place West to Commodore Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76005 as amended by Ordinance No. 76122, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
